parameters: Fade out the screen and show the black bars for the cinematic effect.
Since we aren't using the player, we're going to need to halt
his movement and prevent menu opening, to do this we can simply
use a switch. Without this happening, the player can click to
move the player which will reveal the box-clicky thing
switch to stop movement and prevent opening menu
Change the blank events to mimick our party, set their location, and
make our current party hidden. Uncheck "wait for completion" in set movement
change screens tint and start a screen scroll, then fade in
First, we'll tint it all the way black to make the smooth
Now we fade in the screen to the desired color for 120 frames, or 2 seconds
Move the new party to the left, just before the baddy jumps down
and stops them. Uncheck wait for completion once again and estimate
or playtest to find out how many frames you'll need to wait before
the next action. We want harold to face Therese before she's done moving.
This can also be done in set move rout for harold, but either way works
For therese's last step, we're going to make her walk a bit
We start the dialogue. Make sure the window is transparent, and
you only use the 2 bottom lines of text. We're going to use show
picture to slide in the emotes
-- Start the picture at 734 x and 530 y
Slide it to 730 x and 530 y for about 20 frames, don't wait for
Hello and welcome to Rinsar, Cedric of Haffenden. King Aron gave word - \|\|\^
- that you’d come. I take it that you have heard that the war has come to - \|\|\^
- Rinsars gates too. I am baffled as to why my brothers would turn on me. - \|\|\^
- Either way, we must end this madness whether it means bringing an - \|\|\^
- end to my brothers or not. However, we currently have some problems. The Lords - \|\|\^
- in this city haven’t responded to my requests for help in this war. I fear - \|\|\^
- that they may be planning to align themselves with my brothers. I would - \|\|\^
- like you to go speak to them and see if it is all just a misunderstanding. - \|\|\^
- I’m sure a fresh opinion from another great house will help reassure we are - \|\|\^
- the right side to be on. \|\|\^
Slide the picture back to the right a little, and set opacity to 0.
We're going to be doing this for every emote! Make sure to wait 20 frames
before the next dialogue or the pictures will insta-change rather than
Yes, it may help, we need to act right away! Thank you for welcoming - \|\|\^
You’re welcome, I hope it will be my home for a long time but with all - \|\|\^
- this nonsense going on I don’t know. I don’t think I could - \|\|\^
- ever forgive my brothers for this, could you? I digress, now please - \|\|\^
You obtained Prince Lansee's Entry in the Journal.

Thank you, Lord Cedric you’ve been a great help in Rinsar. I received - \|\|\^
- word from Luthania that your family isn’t safe. The King has gone crazy - \|\|\^
- according to the source. I suggest you go seek out your family. You - \|\|\^
- might fare better at saving yours than I have mine. \|\|\^
Slide the picture back to the right a little, and set opacity to 0.

Well, we can say that Deer, Lamar and Rinsar are safe for now. Someone - \|\|\^
- will need to care of the kingdoms while we ensure that the other kingdoms - \|\|\^
That's a promising idea Richard, but who’s going to fill such a role in - \|\|\^
I'm glad you asked as I found a suitable person to look after the kingdoms. - \|\|\^
- I had started looking not long before you came to Payne. I'd like you - \|\|\^
- I'd like you to meet Lord Roswell, he was the King of Rinsars most trusted - \|\|\^
- there is anyone else that is more fitting for the role. \|\|\^
Why thank you my lord those are truly some kind words. But there is no - \|\|\^
- need for such formalities right now. We need to focus on getting the - \|\|\^
- kingdoms of Deer, Lamar and Rinsar back into shape. Don't worry I will - \|\|\^
- do my best in looking after the kingdoms while you are gone. \|\|\^
Well if Richard trusts you then I trust you. Please do your best in restoring - \|\|\^
Thank you, Lord Cedric your trust is appreciated. I will do my best to - \|\|\^
- keep the kingdoms in appropriate shape. \|\|\^
Please do. Cedric, we must go to Luthania, Idelles pregnant. Idelle has - \|\|\^
- sent for us, she wants us to attend some celebration. \|\|\^
Idelles pregnant? That's great we should be on our way then. At least there - \|\|\^
- is something good going on within this mess. \|\|\^
It will be quite a task to get things back on track but I believe it can be done. - \|\|\^
- I assume that the majority of the wealth and resources of your house - \|\|\^
Sadly, yes. House Haffenden will need to rebuild itself. \|\|\^
Not to worry, Lamar can still be repaired. We will have to source the resources - \|\|\^
- from the other houses in that kingdom. The Randal’s are wealthy with an - \|\|\^
- abundance of crops, they will be able to help repair the damage. Luckily for - \|\|\^
you, you are betrothed to their eldest daughter Reyanah. \|\|\^
Actually, we have a problem there. Richard has gone and found himself - \|\|\^
- another woman who’s somehow convinced him there in love. She's going - \|\|\^
I love Jolicia. I can’t help it if you can’t accept that Cedric. When I - \|\|\^
- received the news of Mothers death, she was there. She helped me. - \|\|\^
- I grew to love her for it. \|\|\^
Lord Richard, I urge you to rethink what you are doing. You will bring - \|\|\^
- a swift end to your house should you end this betrothal. I understand - \|\|\^
- that you don’t love Reyanah but you need her. You need her more than she - \|\|\^
- needs you right now. If you continue with this Jolicia the Randal’s could - \|\|\^
- turn and overthrow you and right now you’d stand no chance. \|\|\^
Look, maybe you will fall in love with Reyanah. But it doesn’t matter, people - \|\|\^
- don’t respect love they respect duty. The duty you must carry out - \|\|\^
- Reyanah. Let Jolicia go. You and your family will be better off for it. \|\|\^
Very well I will speak to Jolicia. \|\|\^
Finally, you seem to be thinking properly. \|\|\^
Would you like to save game?

Cedric, you’re back? What can I do for you? \|\|\^
I came to tell you that the lords won’t support you. I tried to convince them. \|\|\^
It’s alright. You tried and for that I’m grateful. The odds aren’t in - \|\|\^
- my favour, I could very well be dead when my brothers - \|\|\^
- attack. My lords are disloyal and have forsaken their oaths, - \|\|\^
- however, the worst part is I can’t say I don’t understand their choices. - \|\|\^
- Thank you for letting me know. I cannot believe that - \|\|\^
- my little brothers' would try to overthrow me. It’s weird to think we were once so - \|\|\^
- close and now all I can think about how best to bring an end to them. If our - \|\|\^
- father was here to see his sons fighting like this he would be so - \|\|\^
- disappointed. Lord Cedric the bells will sound when my brothers forces - \|\|\^
- are outside the kingdom. They will attack the Lamar and Deer borders. - \|\|\^

None of this makes sense! Why has he turned? Either way, he needs to be - \|\|\^
- stopped but I don’t know where I’m going to find him he could be - \|\|\^
- anywhere in Odaria! What could be his safest stronghold after Rinsar? - \|\|\^
- Lamar... he wouldn’t go there as he knows we will head there, - \|\|\^
- Hyde still has its king and is still fighting, Rouge, Innes and Spaul is too close to - \|\|\^
- Luthania and are fighting, Grispon is too close to Spaul, Deer is too close to Rinsar. - \|\|\^
- That leaves Payne which has a queen and the City of Odaria itself. - \|\|\^
